examples: He was indisposed with a cold.

definitions.definition: Not disposed, predisposed, or inclined; unwilling .
examples: I stayed indoors all day, feeling indisposed to finish mowing the lawn.

definitions.definition: Not yet ready (especially with regard to receiving a visitor) because not yet arranged into a state of readiness (i.e., not disposed ); ( especially, more specifically ) :

subdefinitions.definition: Undressed; not yet dressed enough to be seen by visitors.

secondary_definitions: Not disposed, predisposed, or inclined; unwilling .
